meanings.definition: The quality of being overly selective or fussy in making choices.
meanings.sent1: Her pickiness when it comes to food makes it hard to find a restaurant we both like.
meanings.sent2: His pickiness with colors meant he spent hours choosing the right shade of blue for the walls.
meanings.sent3: The pickiness of the cat in choosing its sleeping spot always amuses us.
meanings.sent4: The pickiness of the director in casting actors led to an outstanding performance.
meanings.sent5: The pickiness of the customer in selecting the perfect gift was legendary in the store.

meanings.definition: The act of being choosy or particular in selecting something.
meanings.sent1: The pickiness of the child in choosing toys often led to long shopping trips.
meanings.sent2: Her pickiness in selecting the right words for the poem showed her attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: The pickiness of the squirrel in gathering nuts provided entertainment for the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: The pickiness of the artist in selecting brushes resulted in a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The pickiness of the chef in choosing ingredients elevated the dish to a gourmet level.
